I

IMailboxServer - Interface in dslab.mailbox
The mailbox server receives mails via DMTP from transfer servers, and makes them available to users via the DMAP protocol.
IMonitoringServer - Interface in dslab.monitoring
The monitoring service accepts incoming monitoring packets via UDP.
ITransferServer - Interface in dslab.transfer
The transfer server is responsible for accepting mails sent by users, and forward them to mailbox servers via DMTP.
